content: Based on the historical evidence presented, it is clear that the papacy, as an institution, has been responsible for the persecution of Christians, both directly and indirectly, through its influence on political powers. This behavior is in direct opposition to the teachings of Jesus Christ, who taught love, compassion, and unity. Therefore, it could be argued that the papacy, in this regard, is a counterfeit system that is not in line with the teachings of the Bible and the true principles of Christianity.
